pr_title: fix(TDI-45089): fix date type for excel

timeline.author: wwang-talend

replies.bodyText:
Inside javajet files. The call is in another PR.
Because we should store libs_src in master but still need to use them in maintenance branches.
https://github.com/Talend/tdi-studio-se/pull/5466/files
replies.author: ozhelezniak-talend

replies.bodyText:
If you asked about where the formats are used.
The answer: Yes, it will be used inside apache poi.
Please, look at the end of TalendXSSFSheetXMLHandler#swapExcelDateFormatOnTalendIfNeed
replies.author: ozhelezniak-talend

timeline.message:
fix(TDI-45089): fix date type for excel

* set date pattern for columns inside excel parser in event mode
fix(TDI-45089): use index of column instead of its name

fix(TDI-45089): include more types

* bump version simpleexcel [2.5-20201119]

fix(TDI-45089): include more types

* bump version simpleexcel [2.5-20201119]

fix(TDI-45089): fix date for excel event mode (#5466)

* use date pattern from studio scheme during parse the date column for event mode
* update version of simpleexcel to [2.5-20201119] (the source code of the lib in master branch)
* apply inter-exchange pattern to avoid date rounding
